raw: China announces new raft of US imports eligible for trade war tariff exemptions .
replaced: China announces new raft of US imports eligible for trade war tariff exemptions .

raw: China has published a second batch of products to be exempt from US trade war tariffs , effective from May 19 for one year .
replaced: China has published a second batch of products to be exempt from US trade war tariffs , effective from May 19 for one year .

raw: There are 79 products in total on the list published on Tuesday by the Ministry of Finance , including rare earth mineral ores , aircraft radar equipment , semiconductor parts , medical disinfectants , and a range of precious metals , chemical and petrochemical products .
replaced: There are 79 products in total on the list published on Tuesday by the Ministry of Finance , including rare earth mineral ores , aircraft radar equipment , semiconductor parts , medical disinfectants , and a range of precious metals , chemical and petrochemical products .

raw: Importers in China must apply to the General Administration of Customs within six months of the announcement to be considered for waivers .
replaced: Importers in China must apply to the General Administration of Customs within six months of The announcement to be considered for waivers .

raw: The first batch of exclusions were announced in September 2019 , and included major agricultural commodities such as soybeans and pork , as well as petrochemical products .
replaced: The first batch of exclusions were announced in September 2019 , and included major agricultural commodities such as soybeans and pork , as well as petrochemical products .

raw: The announcement comes at a heated moment for the United States and China , with sharpened rhetoric prevalent on both sides .

raw: US President Donald Trump last week threatened to tear up the phase one trade deal , signed in January , should China not increase its imports of US goods , as per the purchasing agreement element of the deal .

raw: With supply chains on both sides severely disrupted by the coronavirus outbreak , bilateral trade shrunk in the first four months of the year .
replaced: With supply chains on the United States and China severely disrupted by the coronavirus pandemic , bilateral trade shrunk in the first four months of the year .

raw: China ’s imports of US goods fell by 11.1 per cent in April , customs data released last week showed , and by a colossal 85.5 per cent in March .
replaced: China ’s imports of US goods fell by 11.1 per cent in April , customs data released last week showed , and by a colossal 85.5 per cent in March .

raw: Given that China imported much fewer goods from China in 2019 than it did in 2017 – the baseline scenario used to map out the terms of the trade deal – it is nowhere near meeting the targets .
replaced: Given that China imported much fewer goods from China in 2019 than China did in 2017 – the baseline scenario used to map out the terms of the phase one trade deal , signed in January , – China is nowhere near meeting the targets .

raw: An editorial in the state - run Global Times on Monday suggested that dissenting voices within and advising the Chinese government were pushing for renegotiation of the phase one deal , a suggestion that was swiftly shot down by Trump at a press conference in Washington on Monday .

raw: Among the other US goods to be offered exemptions from trade war tariffs are recombinant human insulin , halogen light bulbs for trains , ships and aircraft , electricity generators , flight data recorders , certain digital cameras , and gold ore .
